1.title: New Default theme Completed
1.message: The new default theme has been completed, Thanks to TheMortal of Realm Designz. The theme is available in 3 color variations, Default is [Grey], Other two colors are [Blue] and [Green]. The Grey version will come with the new install package, The other two will be available for download once the CMS update has been released.

2.title: Nuke Evolution Xtreme 2.0.9e update Released
2.message:
We have released the new update for Nuke Evolution Xtreme, This update will get you right back up to date with all the new PHP 7.x changes.

There is still a lot we want to get done, So there will be patch update released in the near future with further changes.

If you have a trouble updating or installing this new update, please visit the Evolution Xtreme website and let us know, We will be glad to help you.

3.title: Xtremev3 Blue
3.message: TheMortal has released the blue version of the new default theme that comes with Nuke Evolution Xtreme 2.0.9e. This color variant can be downloaded -> here <-

6.title: Xtremev3 Green
6.message: TheMortal has released the green version of the new default theme that comes with Nuke Evolution Xtreme 2.0.9e. This color variant can be downloaded -> here <-

11.title: Evo Lotto Module
11.message:
Evo Lotto module created by coRpSE has been released on Evo Xtremes site for download. Original release date of the module was Feb 18th, 2020.
Available to download -> here <-
Download from Authors site -> here <-

12.title: 2.0.9F update released.
12.message: We have released a new patch update for Evolution Xtreme, The package will update your CMS to version 2.0.9F, This update will add some responsive theme support, for future responsive themes that will be going on sale really soon. You can download the package from the main Xtreme website at the link below. https://evolution-xtreme.co.uk/modules.php?name=File_Repository&action=view&did=30#30 Please be sure to read the description of the download.
